column5: Hell yes.  Go above a few post and follow the link!!!
Just joined, looks like more than ten are waiting...
Need 6 more entries for next round to be drawn
Bump!  C'mon people.... only 6 more needed!

Bump!  We only need 6 more people to sign up, then the next wave of anglers can join teams!  For those of you that haven't participated before, I HIGHLY encourage it! It's just for fun, but still throws that friendly competitiveness into the mix!
Friendly bump!!! Need 3 more for next round.... come on guys and gals, it's lots of fun
Looks like only 2 more people are needed for the next "draft"!
Bump...... still waiting on 2 people to join!  It's free! lol
Ok Brian, we've got our last two Musketeers for this round. Let'er rip!

I'm very anxious to get added, so please, if you feel you can contribute in any way, join the tournament!  Pretty please, it looks like an absolute blast. And what angler doesn't enjoy some friendly competition?
Yes please I second this.  I typed there to join as well.  I hope to come part of it.
Awesome! I see a few more have wished to sign up!  Lets get some more!
Lets see if we can get at least 3 more before the end of today
Hey im in for Joining,Sign me up!
Awesome, go down to the tournament sign up forum and put your name in!!!!
What is this tournament ??? And how do I sign up?

It's a multi species tourny for board members. Sign up in the tournament forum and you'll get added to a team of OFC members. Read through the rules etc to get a clearer idea of how it all works, but its very simple.  Sign up, I'm still waiting myself to get added to a team  follow this link to sing up NOW!!! http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=50035
Bump.  Come on guys, get signed up for the OFC tourney! Gonna be a blast!
Giving this a healthy bump.  If you haven't signed up yet, you'll regret it later.  We just need a few more.  Join here: http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=50035
Might be a stupid question but what do we do for the tournament... I mean I read the rule but what's the goal here... And how do we register fish?
There's never a stupid question, only stupid answers    it's for bragging rights... nothing more   I think you should read the rules again   it's all explained in black and white
So length is everything then... Ok

Yep  Edited to say:  any fish you catch for your team that is not already submitted counts.  Where it gets interesting is when you have to beat a certain length for a species already caught, which in my mind makes it challenging and fun
Yup, so we can all say 'Mine's bigger than yours"
"But we've got the biggest fish of them all"
Well you can count me in for a 30 inch walleye a musky pushing 50inches and a pig if a carp!  Bring on the competition boy and girls
So then what happens - when the ladies submit their entries, and they're so much bigger ?
May happen... My gf has some PBs that would challenge most OFC members
Always love to see guys jinxing themselves for the season...
I'm on the mighty st Lawrence... Trophy fish is what I do... Lol...
Hurry up, we need 3 more sign ups! I'm anxious to get started here
Big bump  Get signed up for some fun folks!
Just signed up.
Can people still sign up?
